sources.title: Million Dollar Kid (1944)
sources.description: Starring Leo Gorcey, Huntz Hall, Gabriel Dell, William 'Billy' Benedict, Louise Currie, Noah Beery, Iris Adrian, Herbert Heyes, Robert Greig, Johnny Duncan, Stanley Brown, Patsy Moran, Mary Gordon, Al Stone, David Durand, Jimmy Strand, Buddy Gorman, Pat Costello, Bernard Gorcey, Pat McKee, Bobby Stone Directed by Wallace Fox Writing by Frank H. Young Produced by Jack Dietz, Sam Katzman, Barney A. Sarecky Music by Edward J. Kay Cinematography by Marcel Le Picard Edited by Carl Pierson Assistant Director - Arthur Hammond Art Department - E.R. Hickson Sound Department - Gilbert E. Meloy Stunts - Eddie Parker, Duke York Country: USA Language: English Release Date: February 28 1944 Production Companies: Banner Productions Distributed by Monogram Pictures (1943) - Path√© Pictures Ltd (1945 UK) - Atlantic Television Corp (1950 TV) Runtime: 1h 4min 15sec In Black & White Sound Mix: Mono Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Negative Format: 35mm Printed Film Format: 35mm Cinematographic Process: Spherical Genres: Comedy, Action, The East Side Kids
